鋀鋀鋀

鋀字的基本解释

鋀
tōu
古同“鍮”，黄铁矿、黄铜矿等一类黄色而有光泽的矿石。

鋀
tù
化学元素“钍”的旧译。

鋀
dòu
古代的酒器。

鋀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tōu］
［《廣韻》託侯切，平侯，透。］
同“鍮1”。
[②]［dòu］
［《集韻》徒口切，上厚，定。］
酒器。
[③]［tù］
化学元素“钍”的旧译名。

鋀字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鋀； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1306第19
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?徒口切，音揄。【說文】本作?。酒器也。　又【廣韻】託侯切【集韻】他侯切，?音偷。石名。似金。與鍮同。

鋀字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鋀字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Stubborn
tōu
In ancient times, it is a kind of yellow and shiny ore such as "paw", pyrite, chalcopyrite and so on.
Stubborn
tù
The old translation of the chemical element "thorium".
Stubborn
dòu
Ancient wine vessel.
Stubborn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tōu］
["Guangyun" asks Hou to cut, Ping Hou, through. ]
Same as "鍮1".
[②]［dòu］
["Jiyun" cut in mouth, thick, set. ]
Wine vessel.
[③]［tù］
The old translation of the chemical element "thorium".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鋀; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1306 Page 19
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? [Said the text] This work?. Wine vessel also.　[Guang Yun] Too Hou Qi [Ji Yun] He Hou Qi,? Sound stealing. Stone name. Like gold. Same as Tao.
